summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4413 for the improvement of the alley in Block 1, Law's Addition and Block 15, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 2, being the alley between 15th Avenue North and 16th Avenue North and from East Mercer Street to East Roy Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52151, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
